title: Conservation of momentum - bar chart collision

content.question: Which of the following best represents the magnitude and direction of the momentum of the two-block system after the collision?

choices.label: The figure shows a bar graph in the coordinate plane with the origin labeled 0. The vertical axis is labeled p and indicates that upward is positive. The bar is negative 4 units.
The figure shows a bar graph in the coordinate plane with the origin labeled 0. The vertical axis is labeled p and indicates that upward is positive. The bar is positive 4 units.
The figure shows a bar graph in the coordinate plane with the origin labeled 0. The vertical axis is labeled p and indicates that upward is positive. The bar is negative 2 units.
The figure shows a bar graph in the coordinate plane with the origin labeled 0. The vertical axis is labeled p and indicates that upward is positive. The bar is positive 2 units.

content.answer: The figure shows a bar graph in the coordinate plane with the origin labeled 0. The vertical axis is labeled p and indicates that upward is positive. The bar is positive 2 units.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
